signature: void putAll(Map<? extends K, ? extends V>)

direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding mappings to the map, with putAll adding multiple mappings at once.
Both methods modify the internal state of the CompositeMap by adding new mappings or maps.
Both methods involve modifying the internal array of maps, though in opposite directions (adding vs. removing).
Both methods may throw UnsupportedOperationException if the underlying maps do not support the operation.
Both methods handle key collisions, though resolveCollision is more specific to the collision resolution process.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the MapMutator to be initialized before performing operations.
Setting up the CompositeMap with initial maps is required before invoking putAll.
Both methods involve verifying the contents of the map after modifications, especially for key collisions.
